verses.verse: And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, But, behold, they will not believe <S%H539><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me, nor hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto my voice <S%H6963><s%>: for they will say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, The YY <S%H3068><s%> hath not appeared <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto thee.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, What is that in thine hand <S%H3027><s%>? And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, A rod <S%H4294><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8685><s%> it on the ground <S%H776><s%>. And he cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it on the ground <S%H776><s%>, and it became a serpent <S%H5175><s%>; and Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> fled <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> it.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, Put forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%>, and take <S%H270><s%> <S%H8798><s%> it by the tail <S%H2180><s%>. And he put forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%>, and caught <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it, and it became a rod <S%H4294><s%> in his hand <S%H3709><s%>:

That they may believe <S%H539><s%> <S%H8686><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Avraham <S%H85><s%>, the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yitz'chak <S%H3327><s%>, and the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, hath appeared <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto thee.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> furthermore <S%H5750><s%> unto him, Put <S%H935><s%> <S%H8685><s%> now thine hand <S%H3027><s%> into thy bosom <S%H2436><s%>. And he put <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> into his bosom <S%H2436><s%>: and when he took <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it out, behold, his hand <S%H3027><s%> was leprous <S%H6879><s%> <S%H8794><s%> as snow <S%H7950><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Put <S%H7725><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> into thy bosom <S%H2436><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8685><s%>. And he put <S%H7725><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> into his bosom <S%H2436><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%>; and plucked <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it out of his bosom <S%H2436><s%>, and, behold, it was turned again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> as his other flesh <S%H1320><s%>.

And it shall come to pass, if they will not believe <S%H539><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee, neither hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> sign <S%H226><s%>, that they will believe <S%H539><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the latter <S%H314><s%> sign <S%H226><s%>.

And it shall come to pass, if they will not believe <S%H539><s%> <S%H8686><s%> also these two <S%H8147><s%> signs <S%H226><s%>, neither hearken <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thy voice <S%H6963><s%>, that thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the water <S%H4325><s%> of the river <S%H2975><s%>, and pour <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it upon the dry <S%H3004><s%> land: and the water <S%H4325><s%> which thou takest <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> out of the river <S%H2975><s%> shall become blood <S%H1818><s%> upon the dry <S%H3006><s%> land.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>, O <S%H994><s%> my YY <S%H136><s%>, I <S%H376><s%> am not eloquent <S%H1697><s%>, neither heretofore <S%H8032><s%> <S%H8543><s%>, nor since <S%H227><s%> thou hast spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%>: but I am slow <S%H3515><s%> of speech <S%H6310><s%>, and of a slow <S%H3515><s%> tongue <S%H3956><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Who hath made <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> man's <S%H120><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>? or who maketh <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the dumb <S%H483><s%>, or deaf <S%H2795><s%>, or the seeing <S%H6493><s%>, or the blind <S%H5787><s%>? have not I the YY <S%H3068><s%> ?
Now therefore go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and I will be with thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and teach <S%H3384><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee what thou shalt say <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, O <S%H994><s%> my YY <S%H136><s%>, send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray thee, by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of him whom thou wilt send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Is not Aharon <S%H175><s%> the Levi <S%H3881><s%> thy brother <S%H251><s%>? I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that he can speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> well <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%>. And also, behold, he cometh forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thee: and when he seeth <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee, he will be glad <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in his heart <S%H3820><s%>.

And thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto him, and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> in his mouth <S%H6310><s%>: and I will be with thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and with his mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and will teach <S%H3384><s%> <S%H8689><s%> you what ye shall do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And he shall be thy spokesman <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto the people <S%H5971><s%>: and he shall be, even he shall be to thee instead of a mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and thou shalt be to him instead of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.
And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> this rod <S%H4294><s%> in thine hand <S%H3027><s%>, wherewith thou shalt do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> signs <S%H226><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Yitro <S%H3500><s%> his father in Torah <S%H2859><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Let me go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I pray thee, and return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto my brethren <S%H251><s%> which are in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> whether they be yet <S%H5750><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%>. And Yitro <S%H3503><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> in Midian <S%H4080><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: for all the men <S%H582><s%> are dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%> which sought <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thy life <S%H5315><s%>.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his wife <S%H802><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and set <S%H7392><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them upon an ass <S%H2543><s%>, and he returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>: and Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the rod <S%H4294><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, When thou goest <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8800><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%> that thou do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all those wonders <S%H4159><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, which I have put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in thine hand <S%H3027><s%>: but I will harden <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his heart <S%H3820><s%>, that he shall not let the people <S%H5971><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%>.

And thou shalt say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> is my son <S%H1121><s%>, even my firstborn <S%H1060><s%>:

And I say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thee, Let my son <S%H1121><s%> go <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8761><s%>, that he may serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me: and if thou refuse <S%H3985><s%> <S%H8762><s%> to let him go <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8763><s%>, behold, I will slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thy son <S%H1121><s%>, even thy firstborn <S%H1060><s%>.

And it came to pass by the way <S%H1870><s%> in the inn <S%H4411><s%>, that the YY <S%H3068><s%> met <S%H6298><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and sought <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> to kill <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8687><s%> him.

Then TZipporah <S%H6855><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a sharp stone <S%H6864><s%>, and cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the foreskin <S%H6190><s%> of her son <S%H1121><s%>, and cast <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it at his feet <S%H7272><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Surely a bloody <S%H1818><s%> husband <S%H2860><s%> art thou to me.
So he let him go <S%H7503><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: then she said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, A bloody <S%H1818><s%> husband <S%H2860><s%> thou art, because of the b'ritmilah <S%H4139><s%>.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Aharon <S%H175><s%>, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>. And he went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and met <S%H6298><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him in the mount <S%H2022><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and kissed <S%H5401><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Aharon <S%H175><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> who had sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him, and all the signs <S%H226><s%> which he had commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> him.

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and Aharon <S%H175><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and gathered together <S%H622><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>:

And Aharon <S%H175><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, and did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the signs <S%H226><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And the people <S%H5971><s%> believed <S%H539><s%> <S%H8686><s%>: and when they heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> had visited <S%H6485><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and that he had looked <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon their affliction <S%H6040><s%>, then they bowed their heads <S%H6915><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and worshipped <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%>.
